title: David Lidington – 2006 Speech on a New Direction for Northern Ireland
author: admin
summary: The speech made by David Lidington on 12 October 2006.
content:
It’s been a good year for our party in Northern Ireland. Our membership is growing and we have regained our toehold in local government.
